title: Quick Look Teaser for Marvel's 'Eyes of Wakanda' Animated Series
description: "Wakanda is a kingdom of many secrets..." Marvel has revealed a first look teaser for their next upcoming animated series titled Eyes of Wakanda, a Marvel Animation presentation. The new series is developed by Ryan Coogler and Proximity Media, to connect it back to Black Panther, and is showrun & directed by artist Todd Harris, best known as a storyboard artist for many movies (including John Wick, Sinners, and Marvel movies). "Wakanda's secrets span centuries." In the series, the Hatut Zaraze, Wakandan warriors, carry out dangerous missions around the world to retrieve vibranium artifacts throughout history. Starring the voices of Winnie Harlow as Noni, Cress Williams as the Lion, along with Patricia Belcher, Larry Herron, Adam Gold, Lynn Whitfield, Jacques Colimon, Jona Xiao, Zeke Alton, Gary Anthony Williams, Steve Toussaint, and Anika Noni Rose. This is barely a 30-second teaser that doesn't reveal much yet, but it does look quite good. As expected having an artist making this series. Stay tuned for more. Here's the first look teaser trailer for Marvel Animation's series Eyes of Wakanda, from YouTube: "Return to Wakanda this August." Marvel Animation's new action-adventure series Eyes of Wakanda follows the adventures of brave Wakandan warriors throughout history. [â€¦]
author: Alex Billington

The new series is developed by Ryan Coogler and Proximity Media, to connect it back to Black Panther, and is showrun & directed by artist Todd Harris,
text: by July 1, 2025Source: YouTube "Wakanda is a kingdom of many secrets..." Marvel has revealed a first look teaser for their next upcoming animated series titled Eyes of Wakanda, a Marvel Animation presentation. The new series is developed by Ryan Coogler and Proximity Media, to connect it back to Black Panther, and is showrun & directed by artist Todd Harris, best known as a storyboard artist for many movies (including John Wick, Sinners, and Marvel movies). "Wakanda's secrets span centuries." In the series, the Hatut Zaraze, Wakandan warriors, carry out dangerous missions around the world to retrieve vibranium artifacts throughout history. Starring the voices of Winnie Harlow as Noni, Cress Williams as the Lion, along with Patricia Belcher, Larry Herron, Adam Gold, Lynn Whitfield, Jacques Colimon, Jona Xiao, Zeke Alton, Gary Anthony Williams, Steve Toussaint, and Anika Noni Rose. This is barely a 30-second teaser that doesn't reveal much yet, but it does look quite good. As expected having an artist making this series. Stay tuned for more. Here's the first look teaser trailer for Marvel Animation's series Eyes of Wakanda, from YouTube: "Return to Wakanda this August." Marvel Animation's new action-adventure series Eyes of Wakanda follows the adventures of brave Wakandan warriors throughout history. In this globe-trotting adventure, the Wakandan heroes must carry-out dangerous missions to retrieve certain Vibranium artifacts from enemies of Wakanda. They are the Hatut Zaraze and this is their story. Eyes of Wakanda is an animated series created and showrun by Todd Harris, an acclaimed storyboard artist & illustrator who has worked on the John Wick movies, Black Widow, Hawkeye, Bullet Train, Black Panther, Sinners, and Thunderbolts. With episodes written by Geoffrey Thorne. Based on the Black Panther & Wakanda comics initially created by Marvel legends Stan Lee & Jack Kirby. Developed by Ryan Coogler and Proximity Media. With episodes directed by Todd Harris. With animated by Marvel Animation. Disney will debut the Eyes of Wakanda series streaming on Disney+ starting on August 27th, 2025 later this summer. First impression? Looking good? Find more posts in: Animation, Marvel, Streaming, To Watch, Trailer
html:
by
July 1, 2025
Source: YouTube

"Wakanda is a kingdom of many secrets..." Marvel has revealed a first look teaser for their next upcoming animated series titled Eyes of Wakanda, a Marvel Animation presentation. The new series is developed by Ryan Coogler and Proximity Media, to connect it back to Black Panther, and is showrun & directed by artist Todd Harris, best known as a storyboard artist for many movies (including John Wick, Sinners, and Marvel movies). "Wakanda's secrets span centuries." In the series, the Hatut Zaraze, Wakandan warriors, carry out dangerous missions around the world to retrieve vibranium artifacts throughout history. Starring the voices of Winnie Harlow as Noni, Cress Williams as the Lion, along with Patricia Belcher, Larry Herron, Adam Gold, Lynn Whitfield, Jacques Colimon, Jona Xiao, Zeke Alton, Gary Anthony Williams, Steve Toussaint, and Anika Noni Rose. This is barely a 30-second teaser that doesn't reveal much yet, but it does look quite good. As expected having an artist making this series. Stay tuned for more.

Here's the first look teaser trailer for Marvel Animation's series Eyes of Wakanda, from YouTube:

"Return to Wakanda this August." Marvel Animation's new action-adventure series Eyes of Wakanda follows the adventures of brave Wakandan warriors throughout history. In this globe-trotting adventure, the Wakandan heroes must carry-out dangerous missions to retrieve certain Vibranium artifacts from enemies of Wakanda. They are the Hatut Zaraze and this is their story. Eyes of Wakanda is an animated series created and showrun by Todd Harris, an acclaimed storyboard artist & illustrator who has worked on the John Wick movies, Black Widow, Hawkeye, Bullet Train, Black Panther, Sinners, and Thunderbolts. With episodes written by Geoffrey Thorne. Based on the Black Panther & Wakanda comics initially created by Marvel legends Stan Lee & Jack Kirby. Developed by Ryan Coogler and Proximity Media. With episodes directed by Todd Harris. With animated by Marvel Animation. Disney will debut the Eyes of Wakanda series streaming on Disney+ starting on August 27th, 2025 later this summer. First impression? Looking good?

Find more posts in: Animation, Marvel, Streaming, To Watch, Trailer
